original_text: These, then, are the things you should teach. Encourage and rebuke with all authority. Do not let anyone despise you.
korean_text: 너는 이것을 말하고 권면하며 모든 권위로 책망하여 누구에게서든지 업신여김을 받지 말라

sentences.original_text: These, then, are the things you should teach.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 이것들이 네가 가르쳐야 할 것들이다.

sentences.original_text: Encourage and rebuke with all authority.
Do not let anyone despise you.
